var.name: atmosphere_precipitable_water_content
var.description:
Var : atmosphere_precipitable_water_content
STASH is None, because atmosphere_precipitable_water_content will be calculated by using formula = + atmosphere_mass_content_of_water - atmosphere_mass_content_of_dust_dry_aerosol_particles - atmosphere_cloud_liquid_water_content - atmosphere_cloud_ice_content
Unit : (kg m-2)
